Class TaxiCo

java.lang.Object
  TaxiCo

public class TaxiCo
extends java.lang.Object

A Taxi Company manages a fleet of taxis and shuttles. Taxis move between single destinations. Shuttles move around circular routes.

Version:
2016.12.03
Author:
David J. Barnes
